title: Plat 5 ADC LFT
body: I'm a plat 5 adc looking for a semi-competitive or casual team to help me improve my gameplay in 5 v 5 rather than just solo queue. Open to criticism and willing to improve myself.

replies.body:
Hey bro! Join our discord and hit me up, we are looking to start a semi competitive team and potentially grow it into a full blown team :) would love to have a chat.
Fyre

Dis: https://discord.gg/B5UcxFX
